interest rate.translation[0].definitions: the percentage amount charged by a bank etc when you borrow money, or paid to you by a bank when you keep money in an account there
interest rate.translation[1].definitions: the percentage rate used for calculating interest over a particular period of time, usually one year
The credit card has an interest rate of 14.8%.
The fear of higher interest rates is driving down the stockmarket.
The fall in interest rates should lead to additional business investment.
